title: 我真心祝愿JJ能与我们永存
author: qwg1995
txt_content:
[img=775,470]file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/a/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/448245671/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/@DF(OP3JV[3(]CWPKCQ9QCT.jpg[/img] [img]file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/a/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/448245671/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/[AJEOERQTHMH]~F%60KZZL~[0.jpg[/img] 
虽然白天留不住你的身影，但我们会永远把你刻在心里，永远记住你那猥琐的脸庞，永远永远
